passage_text: The annual salary for someone with the job title Anesthesia Technician may vary depending on a number of factors including industry, company size, location, years of experience and level of education. For example the median expected annual pay for a typical Anesthesia Technician in the United States is $38,037, so 50% of the people who perform the job of Anesthesia Technician in the United States are expected to make less than $38,037. Source: HR Reported data as of October 2015. 1  Salary. 2  Salary + Bonus. 3  Benefits

Anesthesia Technician Salary. (United States). The average pay for an Anesthesia Technician is $15.30 per hour. Most people with this job move on to other positions after 20 years in this career.

The average salary for anesthesia technician jobs is $37,000. Average anesthesia technician salaries can vary greatly due to company, location, industry, experience and benefits. This salary was calculated using the average salary for all jobs with the term anesthesia technician anywhere in the job listing.

Anesthesia technician salary. Anesthesia technician’s salary (also known as anesthesia tech salary) in the United States according to the Bureau of Labor Statistics $38,740 per year and an hourly wage ranges from $10.51 – $20.03 per hour.
